titleStmt.title: His Majesties gracious patent to the goldsmiths, for payment and satisfaction of their debt. Published by His Majesties command, for the information of their several creditors.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Bill, Christopher Barker, Thomas Newcomb and Henry Hills, printers to the Kings most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: With woodcuts of the Royal Arms, initials.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
